nodes.bodyText: The wilds plot type is not actually wilderness. TownBlocks that don't exist at all are wilderness. getOldType() will probably never return null as TownBlocks always have a type, even if it is the default RESIDENTIAL type.
You can drop the oldType from this.
Doesn't need oldType, as this can be gotten via the TownBlock in the event.
Please change variables to townBlock and townBlockType, for readability.
I missed it before but it's probably a good idea to pass along the resident or player who is changing the plot type, to make the event more usable. After that's done I think this will be ready to go.
